content:
Getting this error on the publisher I've just downloaded:

vadi@vadi-HP-ZBook-14 ~/Programs/fhir-publisher $ java -version
java version "1.8.0_91"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_91-b14)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.91-b14, mixed mode)
vadi@vadi-HP-ZBook-14 ~/Programs/fhir-publisher $ java -jar org.hl7.fhir.igpublisher.jar
Error: Could not find or load main class org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher
Can't see what obvious thing I'm missing
no it's not. I have a generation problem
